function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Spacing the equipment at condensed arrangements may not effectively limit physical proximity, leading to increased risk of contagion.","Impact":"Higher likelihood of disease transmission among facility users.","Mitigation":"Redesigning equipment layout to ensure adequate spacing and physical distancing.","Technologies":"Computer-aided design software to simulate optimal equipment placement.","People":"Facility users, staff, and visitors.","Owner":"Facility management and designers."},{"Description":"Inadequate ventilation and lack of UV light sterilization may result in the persistence of disease-causing agents in the indoor environment.","Impact":"Increased risk of residual contamination and disease transmission.","Mitigation":"Installation of high-quality ventilation systems and UV light sterilizers in key areas.","Technologies":"HVAC systems with HEPA filters, UV-C light sterilization devices.","People":"Facility users, staff, and visitors.","Owner":"Facility management and maintenance team."},{"Description":"Lack of digital monitoring and management systems may hinder the effective implementation of preventive measures and tracking of facility performance.","Impact":"Difficulty in monitoring and enforcing safety protocols, leading to potential outbreaks and inefficiencies.","Mitigation":"Implementation of integrated ICT and digitalization solutions for real-time monitoring and management.","Technologies":"IoT sensors, RFID tracking, mobile apps for member engagement, digital dashboards.","People":"Facility management, staff, and IT professionals.","Owner":"Facility management and technology providers."}]}
